title: Can We Agree that Matchmaking is Broken..? like... REALLY Broken?
body:
I get Riot wants to reset peoples' mmr to weed out the boosted accounts, but seriously? i am silver 4 right now. What in the world am I doing fighting a xin who was plat last season? so what if he lost a few games, doesn't mean he should be at silver IV elo. 

Out of my last 10 games, about 5 of them have had either a smurf, a person who was plat last season, or someone who belongs in bronze 8 but some how placed into low silver... :/ then they lose 10 games and get demoted....


ranked is a joke. it is almost like you don't even need a match making system, just throw random players together. it'd probably be more balanced....
